TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlDoNotCacheCondition extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition

Docs.summary: Represents a condition that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion. The SamlDoNotCacheCondition class represents one of the conditions defined by the SAML specification and it asserts that the SAML assertion must not be cached. To specify this condition for a SAML assertion, add the SamlDoNotCacheCondition class to the collection returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Conditions%2A> property.
> [!NOTE] > When the SamlDoNotCacheCondition is added as a condition to a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token that is issued by a security token service for the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client, a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client does cache the security token. Because the client does not inspect the contents of the issued token, the token is cached. The client is token agnostic for issued tokens type and processes it the returned issued token as an opaque XML element. However, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security never caches the received issued token on the service side; it only caches the claims that are extracted from it during the token authentication process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
Docs.value: if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> instance into a `<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>` element.
